definition: Mt. Fuji, Japan
rich/abundant/wealthy
surname Fu
surname Shi
member of the senior ministerial class (old)/scholar (old)/bachelor/honorific/soldier/noncommissioned officer/specialist worker
surname Shan
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

sentences.english: The wedding will be held at Fuji Mount in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 婚礼将会在日本富士山举行。

sentences.english: Would we recommend climbing Mount Fuji to friends?
sentences.chinese: 我们会向朋友介绍攀登富士山吗？

sentences.english: The snow peaked Fujiyama is the trademark of Japan.
sentences.chinese: 积雪盖顶的富士山是日本的标志。

sentences.english: Japan's Mount Fuji, covered with snow, stands amidst the clouds.
sentences.chinese: 日本富士山，山峰高耸入云，山巅白雪皑皑。

sentences.english: SOMETHING is brewing under Japan's Mount Fuji.
sentences.chinese: 日本富士山的下面似乎正在酝酿着什么。

sentences.english: Japan's Mount Fuji, seen from an airplane, was covered with snow and surrounded by clouds Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 从飞机上俯瞰被积雪和云层覆盖的日本富士山。

sentences.english: Early the next morning, some Japanese families climb Mount Fuji.
sentences.chinese: 第二天清晨，有些日本家庭会爬富士山。

sentences.english: Japan's Mount Fuji, seen from an airplane, was covered with snow and surrounded.
sentences.chinese: 从飞机上俯瞰被积雪和云层覆盖的日本富士山。

sentences.english: Yes, I visited the Fuji Mountain in Japan.
Whatever else, climbing Mount Fuji promised to be a uniquely Japanese experience.
sentences.chinese: 不管怎样，攀登富士山肯定是一种在日本的独特经历。

sentences.english: You love a person just like love the Fuji-Mountain.
sentences.chinese: 其实你喜欢一个人，就像喜欢富士山。

sentences.english: Steven: Well, I actually climbed Mt. Fuji on four different occasions.
sentences.chinese: 嗯，其实我登过四次富士山了，四次不同的体验。

sentences.english: B: It lies to the southwest of Fujiyama,and the forest there is beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 位于富士山西南方向，那里的森林很美丽。

sentences.english: Mt. Fuji has a graceful shape.
Here you can enjoy an onsen complete with views of MT. Fuji.
sentences.chinese: 这里有一处温泉你可以欣尝到富士山英俊的风景。

sentences.english: It lies to the southwest of Fujiyama, and the forest there is beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 位于富士山西南方向，那里的森林很美丽。
